title: Undertow - S.M. Stelmack.mobi
description:

Lindsay SterlingÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s niece has gone missing in the New York underground and the cops do nothing except pass along a name. Jack Cole. Twenty years ago they were good buddies but horrors have changed them both. Lindsay lost her entire family except for her niece in a car accident, and Jack was held captive in New YorkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s underbelly for nearly two years by demented sub-humans. It was a soul-sucking experience thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s left him a shell of a man. He refuses to descend into that hell again, especially for a girl whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s probably dead anyway. But when Lindsay is nearly killed there after going it alone, Jack feels compelled to save her skin. Jack navigates Lindsay through a strange territory, populated with the eccentric, the insane and the desperate. Each encounter takes them closer to LindsayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s niece but also closer into the clutches of the mad creatures that will enslave them.
